channel.title: Server Trouble
channel.description:
ok I'm a kinda good coder I've made a good source already it just has some minor errors i can't fix
1.Teleporting , when i tele port to anywhere it always makes the person look small after they tele
2. lag my server has very bad when about 15 people get on and most people hate it
3. I'm trying to make it where if u click to fast it will warn you, after five warning it will kick you, after 3 kicks your banned can anyone help out there
please if you could help on anything i would really appreciate it thanks :)

item.title: Server Trouble
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

Ummm i think i can solve 2 of the 3 prblems
1.This always happens with pimpscape (gangscape sources) i don’t think you can fix it, the onyl way to get out of this is tele to ghorrock or attk something.
2.Try making your client.java under 1mb and try using hamachi? Unless you have an insanly large server and fast computer no-ip will lagg like a mother at 10+ players.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Trouble
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. use diff source?
    2.15 ppl is a lot if u have T1 Internet it wont lagg better internet more ppl
    3.just keep track of who u kick tell ur mods…

and help me wit that JAR thign plz
